text: Beaumetz-lès-Cambrai is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A farming village located 18 miles (29 km) southeast of Arras on the D18E road. ==Population== ==Sights== * The church of St. Géri, rebuilt, like most of the village, after 1918. * Vestiges of an old castle. * Two World War I cemeteries. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file ==External links== *The cemetery at Beaumetz-lès-Cambrai *The cemetery at Beaumetz crossroads Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Beaumetz-lès-Cambrai
